Getting and Cleaning Data: Fit Activity
---------------------------------------
This project demonstrates the ability to collect, 
work with, and clean a data set. The goal is to prepare tidy data that 
can be used for later analysis. 


Files
------

## run_analysis.r
This script contains the r code that does the fitness activity analysis


## FitActivityCodeBook.Rmd
This is the code book  that contains the code and the explanation of what the code does


## SummarizedActivityData.txt
This is the file that contains the summarized mean and standard deviations by activity
